scripts.format: prettier --write --parser typescript "src/**/*.ts" "prisma/**/*.ts" && eslint --fix --suppress-all "src/**/*.ts" "prisma/**/*.ts" && rm -f eslint-suppressions.json && prisma format
scripts.lint: tsc --noEmit && eslint "src/**/*.ts" "prisma/**/*.ts" && prettier --check --parser typescript "src/**/*.ts" "prisma/**/*.ts" && prisma format --check
scripts.pull-update-script-changes: git reset --hard && git pull origin main && chmod +x ./update.sh
scripts.change-major: npm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: npm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: npm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
